Property.Name: DomainName
Property.Query: (id of it, hostnames of it) of (bes computers) whose ( exists hostnames of it )

Property.Name: HostName
Property.Query: (id of it, name of it) of (bes computers) whose ( exists name of it )

Property.Name: IPAddress
Property.Query: (id of it, ip addresses of it) of (bes computers)

Map.Query: (id of it, operating system of it) of (bes computers) whose (exists operating system of it)
